summary: An email from an FBI forensic accountant to an unspecified recipient regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's financial records, specifically noting an open CapitalOne/SAKS credit card with a zero balance as of August 2019 and indicating a summary of her credit cards is being prepared.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email discusses her credit report and an open CapitalOne/SAKS credit card account, indicating she is under financial scrutiny by the FBI.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant
persons.context: The author of the email who is analyzing Maxwell's Experian credit report and preparing a summary of her credit cards for the FBI New York Field Office.

connections.description: The forensic accountant is investigating Maxwell's financial records, specifically her credit card accounts, as part of an FBI inquiry.

events.title: Credit card status check
events.description: As of this date, Ghislaine Maxwell's CapitalOne/SAKS credit card had a zero balance, with the last payment made in May 2019, per her Experian report.

events.title: Email regarding Maxwell's finances
events.description: An FBI forensic accountant sends an email discussing Maxwell's credit card information and indicates a summary of her credit cards is being prepared.

locations: FBI New York Field Office, 26 Federal Plaza, NYC, NY 10278
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell had an open CapitalOne/SAKS credit card as of August 2019, with a zero balance and last payment in May 2019.
The FBI was actively investigating Maxwell's financial records, including her credit card accounts, in June 2020.
The document is an internal FBI email from a forensic accountant, indicating ongoing financial scrutiny as part of the investigation.
